snippet: Earlier this year, I wrote that if the economy added more than 150,000 jobs per month, President Obama looked to be a favorite for re-election, but is that number lower now?
abstract: Earlier this year, I wrote that if the economy added more than 150,000 jobs per month, President Obama looked to be a favorite for re-election, but is that number lower now?

headline.main: Has Obama's Magic Jobs Number Changed?
